description: This market town is located near Therfield in East Hertfordshire, next to the River Rib. The town includes many historic buildings including medieval timber framed houses and picturesque thatched cottages. This circular walk from the town takes you south to Aspenden where you can enjoy some views of the impressive Aspenden Hall. The walk starts in the village and then picks up public footpaths heading south towards Aspenden Hall which dates back to 1856 and is a listed building. You can then follow another footpath back to Buntingford with a riverside path along the River Rib toward the end.
